query:
UPDATE question_progress 
SET firstAttemptStatus = status,
    lastAttemptCorrect = CASE 
      WHEN status = 'correct' THEN TRUE
      WHEN status = 'incorrect' THEN FALSE
      ELSE NULL
    END
WHERE firstAttemptStatus = 'unanswered';

    END
